text:
[Verse]
City lights shine bright
Walking through the night
People passing by
Underneath the sky

[Verse 2]
Neon signs aglow
Cars they come and go
Sidewalks feeling fast
Memories that last

[Chorus]
Oh oh city beats
Pulsing in our hearts
Feel the rhythm start
In the city streets

[Verse 3]
Skyscrapers touch the moon
Shadows shifting soon
Laughter in the air
Living without care

[Bridge]
Dancing on the lanes
Rain drops leave no stains
Echoes in the dark
Find our hidden spark

[Chorus]
Oh oh city beats
Pulsing in our hearts
Feel the rhythm start
In the city streets
title: City Lights
